resources.string: Please wait while we\'re connecting to the Polyjam Server...
Enter your name\n and join the jam:
ENTER YOUR NAME AND JOIN THE JAM
If you had fun and want to keep in touch, please leave us your email:
Something went wrong..\nGo to the Polyjam people.\nThey will help you.
Hi!\nYou are now registered.\nPlease wait, we will text you when it\'s your turn..
Please take a moment to leave us your email.
But there\'s someone else that wants to jam now ...\nStick around and we\'ll text you again when it\'s your turn.\n
